module.name: condition_evaluation
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of structured data holders for recording evaluated values of simple or compound criteria as well as slots to record the evaluation results of a condition being evaluated.

inscope.li: The identification of the condition evaluated
The identification of the object evaluated
The recording of parameter values evaluated and evaluation outcome
The recording of the result of condition evaluated

outscope.li: Evaluation of objects not identifiable by an ISO 10303 specified entity and its associated identifier
The computation or conversion of parameter values
Parameter values directly from physical signals
Identification and access of objects implied by a class hierarchy
